Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1965...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1968, off Bill Graham (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1968, off Eddie Watt (NYY)...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (A) on 8/14/1968...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/28/1970 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 7/21/1970 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 10/1/1970 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1971, hitting .536 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1971, hitting .556 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Injured on 4/18/1972 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/10/1972, hitting .455 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against California on 6/23/1972...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against California on 6/23/1972...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/24/1972, hitting .516 with 4 HR, 14 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1972, hitting .385 with 13 HR, 29 RBI...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 9/6/1972...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1972...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1973, hitting .300 with 7 HR, 25 RBI...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Traded from Cleveland to Baltimore on 7/23/1973 (Going to CLE: 3B P. Guerrero, 3B D. Holmberg, P B. Ellingsen. Going to BAL: RF B. Bonds)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1973...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 4/7/1975...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1975...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Boston on 6/3/1976...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1977, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1977, hitting .326 with 4 HR, 16 RBI...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1979, hitting .440 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/16/1980, off Tom Seaver (CAL)...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (A) on 10/7/1981...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/2/1983 to a 1-year deal worth $5,855,858 per year...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/8/1984 to a 1-year deal worth $5,855,858 per year...
Drafted in 4th round, 77th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1985...
Injured on 8/1/1985 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 6-7 weeks...
Earned first career win on 8/29/1987...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Atlanta on 7/31/1988 (Going to ATL: CF G. Thurman, RF J. Felix, P D. Cook. Going to CHC: CF R. Henderson, P B. Sutter)...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/2/1993 to a 3-year deal worth $2,874,562 per year...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
